video_prompt: Floating islands drift through a star-filled, shifting nebula sky. Glowing flora pulsates on islands that slowly revolve. A luminous bed and telescope subtly shimmer. Erratic light tendrils undulate from island undersides, casting dynamic reflections on drifting clouds. A winding path of smaller islands subtly brightens and dims in the distance, culminating in a spiraling, pulsing light source.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Ethereal nighttime scene of floating islands. A main island features a glowing, starry bed, glowing flora (purple and white), a glowing lamp, and a telescope. Its underside has luminous tendrils. Behind it, a winding pathway of smaller glowing islands spirals into a miniature galaxy. Deep indigo sky with swirling nebulae and countless stars, with soft, cool blue and purple lighting. Whimsical and dreamy.
refined_video_prompt: Floating islands drift through a continuously shifting nebula. Flora pulsates with shifting luminosity on slowly revolving islands. Light subtly shimmers from a bed and telescope. Erratic light tendrils undulate from island undersides, dynamically reflecting on drifting clouds. A distant path of islands brightens and dims, culminating in a spiraling, pulsing light source.
